Next
Back

01

Super Drillboy
Mobile Game
 Unity, C#, Unity Cloud

Drill and blast your way downward through infinite, procedurally generated levels.
Go as deep as you can, avoiding hazards and collecting gems to gain speed boosts and buy upgrades.

Play Game in Browser View Source Code
Next
Back

02

TRNKT
Full Stack Web Application
 React, TypeScript, ASP.NET, AWS, Opensea API

Explore the strange world of crypto artwork that is NFTs.
Users can create a free account to browse and collect NFT art pieces provided by the Opensea API.

Launch App View Source Code
Next
Back

03

Arcane Outlaw
PC Game
Unity, C#, Unity Cloud

Western meets Fantasy in this Old West shooting gallery game featuring fire-breathing Hydras.
Defeat increasingly harder rounds of enemies using summoning spells and of course, your trusty six-shooter.

In this portfolio, I've chosen some recent projects to showcase.

01

Super Drillboy
Mobile Game
 Unity, C#, Unity Cloud

Drill and blast your way downward through infinite, procedurally generated levels.

Go as deep as you can, avoiding hazards and collecting gems to gain speed boosts and buy upgrades.

02

TRNKT
Full Stack Web Application
 React, TypeScript, ASP.NET, AWS, Opensea API

Explore the strange world of crypto artwork that is NFTs.
Users can create a free account to browse and collect NFT art pieces provided by the Opensea API.

03

Arcane Outlaw
PC Game
Unity, C#, Unity Cloud

Western meets Fantasy in this Old West shooting gallery game featuring fire-breathing Hydras.
Defeat increasingly harder rounds of enemies using summoning spells and of course, your trusty six-shooter.
